paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses cardiac amyloidosis and includes information on the TTR gene, specifically mentioning the V122I mutation in ATTR patients.

functional_data.summary: The V122I mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The V122I mutation segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The paper mentions that all ATTR patients were African Americans with the V122I mutation.
key_quotes: All ATTR patients were African Americans with the V122I mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
